songs.title: Diemonds
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
We are diamonds, but we gonna shine forever
Like a diamond in the sky
When they carry me home, when I’m gone
Still be singing a million years
After, we all die we all die we all diemonds

[Verse 1]
Staring at a cloud, can't get it by, money make the world go round
Got me living life fast, just like that, It could all end right now
Tell it 'till I D-I, D,D-I give it up when it all falls down
Tell it 'till I D-I, D,D-I keep it up when it all falls down
Cause this is how it feels when you find yourself kinda like a diamond you mine yourself
Mind over matter, time don't matter, Remember to remind yourself

[Hook]
We are diamonds, but we gonna shine forever
Like a diamond in the sky
When they carry me home, when I’m gone
Still be singing a million years
After, we all die we all die we all diemonds

[Verse 2]
I ain't gotta price that'll save my life. Ima leave it up in the air
Thinking about the heights that'll change my life. Never said life was fair
So tell it 'till I D-I, D,D-I give it up when it all falls down
Tell it 'till ii D-I, D,D-I give it up when it all falls down
Cause this is how it feels when you find yourself kinda like a diamond you mine yourself
Mind over matter, time don't matter, Remember to remind yourself

[Hook]
We are diamonds, but we gonna shine forever
Like a diamond in the sky
When they carry me home, when I’m gone
Still be singing a million years
After, we all die we all die we all diemonds

[Verse 3]
We don't wish on stars
That's just how we are
We all die, We all die, we all diemonds
We all die, We all die, we all diemonds

[Hook] X2
We are diamonds, but we gonna shine forever
Like a diamond in the sky
When they carry me home, when I’m gone
Still be singing a million years
After, we all die we all die we all diemonds
